channel.title: Alias on Coding notes - cheat sheets and snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Alias on Coding notes - cheat sheets and snippets

item.title: Remove curl alias from PowerShell
item.description: PowerShell aliases curl to Invoke-WebRequest by default. To use the actual curl binary, remove the alias in your profile. Create a PowerShell profile if you don’t have one: New-Item $profile -force -itemtype file Edit the profile: notepad $profile Add this line: remove-item alias:curl Apply changes by restarting PowerShell, or reload the profile: . $profile
